author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Polinvest 7 Buys 65.45% Stake Of Sare In Tender Offer
text:
Feb 22 (Reuters) - SARE SA:
* SAID ON WEDNESDAY THAT IN RESULT OF TENDER OFFER POLINVEST 7 ACQUIRED 1,499,720 SHARES OF SARE REPRESENTING 65.45% STAKE OF COMPANY
* POLINVEST 7 IS IN AGREEMENT WITH TOMASZ PRUSZCZYNSKI, WHO HOLDS 25.99% STAKE OF SARE
* TOMASZ PRUSZCZYNSKI AND POLINVEST 7 ANNOUNCED TENDER OFFER FOR SAREâ€˜S SHARES REPRESENTING UP TO A 74.01% STAKE IN COMPANY ON DEC.15
Source text for Eikon:
